level.heading: NOTICE OF TRANSFER OF A LICENSE TO A NEW OWNER (ยง 23-1504)

level.text: Notice to the public of any change in the ownership of a licensed establishment shall be in accordance with this section.

If a license transfer to a new owner occurs, as set out in D.C. Official Code ยง 25-405, and the new owner proposes to make substantial changes to the establishment, notice of the change in ownership and the change in operation shall be made in the same manner as set out in D.C. Official Code ยง 25-404.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 51 DCR 4309 (April 30, 2004); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 55 DCR 12991 (December 26, 2008).
